bonus.value: Increase crit damage by 14%/15%/16%/18%. This effect does not stack. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

When dealing volt damage, increase final damage by 2.75% for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5/6/7/8 times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

mind.name: Dream
mind.desc: I dream of chocolate. Can I believe that this is real?

memory.name: Abandoned Dog
memory.desc: A shackled past, a wandering present.

belief.name: Home
belief.desc: Will I ever have a home?

emotion.name: Dependence
emotion.desc: If there are no more goodbyes, I am alright with being used.
